profile.summary:
A US Recruiting Professional with over 6 year of diversified experience in the area of Direct/Contract
recruiting ,Vendor Management and Organizational Development. Enthusiastic, work-oriented professional, diversified experience in US Recruitment/Staffing in different domains including Federal, Banking, Information Technology (IT). Worked on different leading technologies like AI (Artificial Intelligence), ML (Machine Learning), Hadoop, AWS, Cloud, DevOps, etc. Possess excellent knowledge of recruiting and hiring processes including sourcing, interviewing tracking, salary negotiations, and
closing. Recruited for multiple skills, domains, levels and locations. Possess the ability to work independently as well as a team leader and as a team player. Have good experience in US Staffing, Specializing in Headhunting, Actively building VMS (Vendor Management System), Building Resume Database. Good Team Player with interpersonal, Good Oral and written Communication in English Worked on Recruiting H1B Consultants, GC holders, TN Citizens and US Citizens for Direct Clients and Vendor Requirements. Good Knowledge of different contracts W2 (without Benefits), Corp 2 Corp and 1099. Good in passive recruiting. Candidates sourced through LinkedIn. Kept records of the candidates interviewed and updated them through e-mails about the process.
profile.headline: Recruiting Team Lead at Shimento, Inc. M.A Hons. School in Economics. Dept. of Economics (PU)

experience.description:
Responsible for mentoring a Team of Recruiters right from making them understand the requirements that we receive from the client, Keywords formation, Screening Candidates, 2nd Level Closing, Interview Set-Ups, Prep-Ups and making sure that the candidate is delivered once the Job Offer is made to them.
Developed recruiting strategies to identify qualified professionals through various job boards, professional and social network, recruiting tools and unconventional methods for contract, contract-to-hire opportunities.
Explained engagements and long lasting relationships with quality candidates through meetings and consistent coaching to the team
Trained and developed recruiters in unique strategies to find passive candidates.
Coached the team on regular basis to build organizational database with regular additions of premier candidates.
Managed day in and day out coordination of Delivery, Sales, Operations, and Candidate Relations for an organized / smooth process of on-boarding and project completion of individual candidates.
experience.title: Recruiting Team Lead

experience.description:
Digital Intelligence Systems, LLC (DISYS) is a global staffing, IT consulting & managed services firm with more than 33 offices worldwide. Within these offices, DISYS employs industry problem solvers who have the expertise to understand industry staffing issues but also possess the knowledge to locate. inefficiencies, design and implement game-changing automation and other IT service offerings.
Assist a team of  recruiters focused on hiring individual contributors for Financial & Banking positions.
Work closely with Hiring Managers to develop position profile and to understand overall needs and requirements.
Seeking out professionals with the right combination of experience, education and skills to fill a particular position.
Effectively recruits high Caliber, quality candidates, by partnering with hiring managers to understand their business strategies and talent needs.
Drive and manage the interview and selection process.
Achieve overall staffing needs of assigned client groups by filling open positions with qualified candidates within the specified timeframe.
Facilitate internal and external recruitment process, effectively interviewing and evaluating candidates utilizing consistent criteria and evaluative measures.
Utilize creative sourcing techniques including but not limited to internet mining, cold calling, and referral programs.
Ensure a diverse talent pool is sourced, assessed, and presented for open positions.
Extend, negotiate, and close job offers to candidates.
Build and develop a strong, competitive bench of external talent for all opportunities within the assigned functional area.
Develop and maintain a strong external recruitment network.
Establish and maintain a candidate database of pre-qualified candidates to meet current and anticipated staffing needs.
Utilize the ATS system to maintain candidate information and accurate data for reporting purposes.
Provide mentoring support to other Recruiters on the team.
experience.title: Senior Technical Recruiter, Centralized F&A, Financial & Banking Services at DISYS

experience.description:
• Lead a team of 8 recruiters and was responsible for their overall training.
• Solicited and identified prospective candidates by telephone, e-mail and the internet to determine skills, experience and areas for 
geographic employment, preferences, availability and visa status.
• Ensured that adequate number of qualified candidates is submitted for all assigned client requirements in a timely manner.
• Sourced potential candidates through job portals, networking and head hunting in target software companies.
• Matched the profile of the candidate on technical grounds.
• Conducted initial interviews by phone to determine experience and skill level.
• Ensured candidate is available and ready to take up the position.
• Ensured that resume appropriately reflects candidate’s experience and requirement.
• Negotiated salaries with candidates and closed the position.
• Arranged for client interviews and possible offer of employment.
• Maintained and updated the company’s Applicant Tracking System (ATS) like JOBDIVA sending mails to the consultant & 
maintain their updated status in a separate excel sheet.
• Handled the tasks of picking up the requirement from Vendor Management systems like: Fieldglass.
• Tapped talent via LinkedIn for niche skills & built a pipeline for subsequent requisitions.
• Mentored and provided on-going training and support for new recruiters and served as a resource for learning and navigating 
senior technical policies and procedures.
• Handled I.T. requirements (Java, Python, UI Architect, Data Scientist, DevOps Engineer, Cloud, Architect, Developer, Data 
Warehousing and Testing) from Banking, Insurance, Financial Client.
experience.title: Lead Recruiter

experience.description:
• Managing the full life cycle recruitment process for high volume hiring at all levels.
• Creating and posting requisitions, reviewing resumes, following up on the updates through the hires.
• Participating in staffing, intake and status update meetings with key stakeholders and submitting weekly reports to the management 
• Recruited utilizing unique sourcing methodologies through associates and internet (Monster, Dice, Career Builder, Job Diva and other social recruiting media).
• Recognized for out of the box thinking, consistent and good performance in the company.
• Involved in full life - cycle Recruitment including Requirements understanding, Initial screening, short listing, interviewing, negotiating and making offers.
experience.title: Senior Technical Recruiter

experience.description:
• Senior level sourcing of profiles particularly with Financial Background for Top notch Banks in US.
• Provide full life cycle recruitment support which includes: sourcing, screening, interviewing, assessing and presenting a diversified and high-quality pool of candidates to the business leaders in a timely manner.
• Drive the recruitment and candidate assessment process from requisition to offer.
• Develop and maintain internal and external relationships that facilitate acquiring talent to align with business needs.
• Leveraging online recruiting resources and in-house ATS (JobDiva) to identify and recruit the very best candidates
• Was working as an IT Recruiter, Specializing in Headhunting, actively building VMS (Vendor Management System), Building 
Resume Database. Good Team Player with interpersonal, Good Oral and written Communication in English, Worked on Recruiting GC holders, TN Citizens and US Citizens for Direct Clients.
• Good Knowledge of different contracts W2, Corp 2 Corp and 1099. Good in passive recruiting. Candidates sourced through LinkedIn. Kept records of the candidates interviewed and updated them through e-mails about the process.
• Sourcing, screening, short listing & interviewing the candidates as per the Business Unit requirement through various resume posting boards, Portals and Database Searches, Job postings, and through Referrals.
• Maintaining excellent long-lasting relationships with various Vendors for obtaining consultant/candidates for many or major positions
• Negotiating salaries and performing detailed interviews.
• Created, sourced and managed Job postings or using search query through Monster, Dice & CB.
experience.title: Technical Recruiter
